Package main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionAcceptorStartupException Deprecated 
    ConnectionErrorException
    Thrown if there is an error with a Connection when attempting to perform an action
    IllegalComponentStateException  
    InvalidMeetingIDException
    Thrown by a ValidationServerConnector if the MeetingID passed into a method is invalid
    InvalidMessageException  
    InvalidTokenException
    Thrown when attempting to retrieve the information relating to a user on a ValidationServer if the token used is invalid
    MalformedJSONException  
    MessageNotEventException
    Thrown by the MessageEventParser when MessageEventParser#parseMessageToEvent(main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.communication.protocol.Message) is called with an invalid message
    ServerUnavailableException
    Thrown by DataServerConnector When a request is made but the server is unavailable to query
    StartupException
    Thrown if there is an error during calling start on a server component
    UserExistsException
    Thrown by a Meeting if a participant tries to join a meeting they're already in
    ValidationFailedException
    Thrown internally in the ConnectionValidator if one of the following occur: - A message fails to send to the client - The client does not respond in time - Information such as the Authentication Token or MeetingID is not valid - The validation server is unavailable for querying
